Direct Known Subclasses:
SocialConnectedTag, SocialNotConnectedTag
public abstract class BaseSocialConnectedTag
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.tags.RequestContextAwareTag

SocialConnectedTag and SocialNotConnectedTag extend to provide functionality within a JSP to determine if you are connected to a provider or not.

Author:
Rick Reumann, Craig Walls
